comments:
CDT Build 200505301223. Select a standard build project's properties. Select
Include paths & symbols in the left panel. Click Add Contributed... In the
Contributed Include Path Selection dialog, select "Discovered Scanner Selection
Container" and click Next to go to page 2. Click next to go to page 3 but you
get an error dialog with the log below. You have to click OK 50+ times to
finally close the error dialog. Page 3 of the wizard opens with an empty list
with only checkboxes (see attached).
